text_body: Thank you for you interest in our listening test.
This is a classic pairwise dissimilarity experiment for
Your task will be to rate the perceived distances between all
possible pairs of sounds (same pairs included) within a stimulus
set of 24 tones. This equates to 300 comparisons overall. Because
of the number of tasks, the system will prompt you to take a
small break every 100 comparisons in order to help maintain
